position.description: The position of this category relative to other categories.

locale.description: The locale where the category is displayed.

url.description: The API url of this category.

html_url.description: The url of this category in Help Center.

source_locale.description: The source (default) locale of the category.

outdated.description: Whether the category is out of date.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the category was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the category was last updated.
